message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to me. Considering its importance and the benefits it would bring to someone like yourself, I propose a price of $12,500 for this item. This offer reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic worth and the value it could add to your life. I believe this price is advantageous for both parties and allows you to experience the full potential of the product. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
